import React, { useState } from "react"; import "./Whatnew.css"; const BoxColorExample = () => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState("tab1"); return ( <> {/* ===== FIRST SECTION ===== */}

WhatNew Affiliates

Want to get paid to share the app you already love?

Whether you’re a content creator, run an online community, or have a website, blog or newsletter — you can now join WhatNew Affiliates!

Be a part of the future of shopping. Only on WhatNew.

{/* ===== FAQ TAB SECTION ===== */}

Frequently Asked Questions

{/* ===== Tab Buttons ===== */}
{/* ===== Tab 1 Content ===== */} {activeTab === "tab1" && (

What is WhatNew?

WhatNew is the largest live shopping platform where you can buy, sell, and discover amazing products in real time.

Is WhatNew free to use?

Yes! Signing up and browsing on WhatNew is completely free for all users.

Which countries support WhatNew?

WhatNew is currently available in North America and Europe, with plans to expand globally soon.

)} {/* ===== Tab 2 Content ===== */} {activeTab === "tab2" && (

How do I join the Affiliate Program?

You can apply via Impact.com — once approved, you’ll gain access to your unique affiliate links and dashboard.

How do I earn commission?

You earn when someone clicks your affiliate link and purchases within 3 days.

When will I be paid?

Affiliates are paid monthly once the payout threshold is met via Impact.com.

)}
); }; export default BoxColorExample;
